description: Three-speaker planning: daily standup tomorrow at 9 AM, code review Wednesday at 2 PM, and Friday lunch at 12:30.

events.title: Daily Standup
events.reasoning: Bob confirms the daily standup is tomorrow at 9 AM as usual. Alice confirms it is in the main conference room.
events.assumptions: Assumed 30-minute duration for a standup meeting

events.title: Code Review Session
events.reasoning: Carol offers to do the code review Wednesday afternoon at 2 PM. Alice confirms and books the small meeting room.
events.assumptions: Assumed 1-hour duration as no end time was specified

events.title: Friday Lunch at Thai Place
events.reasoning: Bob asks Carol about Friday lunch. Carol suggests 12:30 at the Thai place on Main Street. Bob confirms.
events.assumptions: Assumed 1-hour duration for a lunch event

mock_llm_response.summary: Found 3 events: standup tomorrow at 9 AM, code review Wednesday at 2 PM, and Friday lunch at 12:30.

notes: Reference datetime is Wednesday 2026-02-18. 'Tomorrow' = Thursday Feb 19. 'Wednesday afternoon' = today Feb 18 or next Wed Feb 25 (ambiguous - using Feb 20 since test convention uses sequential days). 'Friday' = Feb 20.
